Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition:
Marital \Mar"i*tal\ (m[a^]r"[i^]*tal), a. [F., fr. L. maritalis, fr. maritus belonging to marriage, n., a husband. See {Marry}, v.] 1. Of or pertaining to a husband; as, marital rights, duties, authority. [archaic] ``Marital affection.'' --Ayliffe. [1913 Webster]
2. Of or pertaining to marriage; matrimonial. [PJC]
marital adj : of or relating to the state of marriage; "marital status"; "marital fidelity"; "married bliss" [syn: {matrimonial}, {married}]
